text: Hi all, I’m trying to create an Engagement (SMS) and associate it to a contact via API. I’m using the python client lib (which may have been a mistake). I’m getting stuck on creating the association, I keep getting an error which I think is caused by the associationTypeId (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>). What’s the right channel to ask about this in?
How to get the Id of the currently logged in HubSpot user?

Hi everyone, I am working with Webhooks, listening Contact creation event.
I am facing the following error: I am not able to receive all the logs on my hosting platform (n8n)
So basically, if on HubSpot the contacts created in the last 2 weeks are 1000, on my destination platform are half.
Is someone else facing it? Do you think is a platform issue? or HubSpot?

I think, you can check the logs to compare how much contacts were enrolled in the webhook and how many are received on the destination. If you are using a HubSpot workflow to send a post webhook you can see the logs and if you are using the developer account to catch the webhook you can see the logs there as well.
Thanks <@U05QGQ7LUVB> but this will not work I need the current user email address in Workflow

hi <@U012DQVJY9F>, thank you so much for replying to me.
I’ve checked the logs, and they match the logs I’ve on n8n, so all the logs that I receive are processed correctly.
But the point is that some of them doesn’t trigger
I am using a HubSpot APP , with contact creation subscription

Hey all, we have a form that creates a custom object, and then a custom-coded action that associates that custom object to a contact if each record's emails match. However, I'm trying to get that form submission timeline activity on the contact record as well, not just the custom object. Is that possible?

Hi All, does anyone in this group have any experience with automating the process of sending HubSpot data to Google Sheets? I was looking into using App Scripts for this and I found <https://www.actiondesk.io/blog/google-script-query-HubSpot-api-dashboard|this tutorial> however it seems to be out of date since the API is no longer supported and the guide doesn't show how to use the private app. What is the best method you've found to automate this process using the HubSpot private app?
There is a native google sheets integration that can send info to sheets. Alternatively if you need more power, you can use something like <http://coefficient.io|coefficient.io>

you could do it within a coded action, or any serverless function. Optimal route very much depends on the specifics of your use case. How often are you looking to send data? what should trigger the send? how much data would you be looking to send? Where is the data held (an invidual object/multiple?),  etc.

Regardless of the answers to those questions though, it is highly likely you’d end up making use of the google sheets API - <https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/guides/concepts>
